item.title: Elliotte Friedman
item.description: Who is Elliotte Friedman? This is Elliotte Friedman. Tonight's edition of @scotiabank Wednesday Night Hockey begins NOW on @Sportsnet -- CAL/MON — Elliotte Friedman (@FriedgeHNIC) April 14, 2021 CAL and MON are not abbrevations. With this translator now you can make an educated guess as to what ELF is trying to say. What did Elliot Friedman say this time: Decipher function friedman() { var acronym = document.getElementById("myText"); var teams = ["

item.title: First Person AHK
item.description: Introduction The first time I had ever used AHK was back in highschool. My friend made a Discord bot called “Starmine” that would give out points whenever a user typed !starmine. It was a fun incremental/idle game that we all played, and while you could wait for the passive point generation, the fastest way to get points was to type !starmine. The game got really competitive and as we went into the summer months and I needed a way to edge out the competition.

item.title: How to run a Tor relay as a student for free
item.description: This post is based on Robert DeVore’s “Run a Tor relay” found here: https://www.robertdevore.com/run-a-tor-relay/ Tor is a service used by thousands of people everyday to access the internet safely and anonymously. While I have been using Tor for quite some time, it always seemed daunting to help the Tor network by running a relay. Horror stories about getting mail from ISPs relating to the traffic of anonymous users accessing illegal materials masked by your IP.
